Instruction: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Mix together flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar. In a separate bowl, beat egg, milk, and melted shortening. Combine the two mixtures and stir in the corn.
Fry spoonfuls of fritter batter in the hot oil until golden, working in batches.
Serve the food and savor every bite!
